meanings.sent1: The rimous plate was perfect for serving desserts.
meanings.sent2: The rimous lid of the jar kept the contents fresh.
meanings.sent3: The rimous hat looked stylish and unique.
meanings.sent4: The rimous clouds framed the sunset beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The rimous design on the vase added an elegant touch.

meanings.definition: Covered with a rim or border.
meanings.sent1: The rimous table had intricate carvings along the edges.
meanings.sent2: The rimous frame highlighted the artwork perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The rimous cake was decorated with a delicate frosting border.
meanings.sent4: The rimous coastline was dotted with small coves.
meanings.sent5: The rimous pattern on the fabric added a touch of sophistication.
